definition: behavior that makes your feelings public, to show, make visible or apparent
details:
noun
- behavior that makes your feelings public
= example: behavior that makes your feelings public
- something shown to the public
= synonyms: showing
- a visual representation of something
= synonyms: presentation
- an electronic device that represents information in visual form
- something intended to communicate a particular impression
= example: something intended to communicate a particular impression
= synonyms: show
- exhibiting openly in public view
= example: exhibiting openly in public view
verb
- to show, make visible or apparent
= synonyms: exhibit, expose
- attract attention by displaying some body part or posing
